import React from "react"; function Review() { let {id, img, imgName,category, updatedAt} = { id: "1", imgName: "Irene", img: "https://media.istockphoto.com/photos/global-connection-picture-id1335295270?b=1&k=20&m=1335295270&s=170667a&w=0&h=PNF6QH5FyD_XvDbn4nHtIVKdmmlN86fCHTgwvkZYvHA=", category: "", updatedAt: "2 days ago", } // post review const submitReview = () => {}; return (

{imgName}

  • {category}
{updatedAt}
); } export default Review;
